skills.name: SNOWBALL TOSS
skills.description: [RMB]: Throw snowball that explodes upon hitting the ground. Inflicts stun and freeze. HOLD [RMB] to charge.

skills.name: BREATH OF FRIGID AIR
skills.description: [F],[LMB]: Inflicts full freeze. On end, turns enemies into snowmen for 4s. Breaking them out deals damage (300/400/500).

skills.name: SLIP AND SLIDE
skills.description:
[Q]: Slide along the ground.
[Q],[Q]: Perform melee hit that pushes enemies.

skills.name: FROST PATH
skills.description: [E]: Create a path of ice in front of you that inflicts freeze. Grants speed boost to allies.

skill-upgrades.name: Defensive Swings
skill-upgrades.description: +5 armor for each successful hit. (Lasts 3s, maximum +20 armor)

skill-upgrades.name: Cold Kit Combo
skill-upgrades.description: After using any other skill, the first hit deals +50% damage. (Within 3s)

skill-upgrades.name: Cold and Frail
skill-upgrades.description: Hitting Frozen enemies weakens them. (-25% damage, 2s)

skill-upgrades.name: Cold Remedy
skill-upgrades.description: Hitting frozen enemies heals you. (40 HP/s, stacks at 100% with other heals)

skill-upgrades.name: Extra Sauce
skill-upgrades.description: Deals +100% damage against frozen enemies.

skill-upgrades.name: Ice Breaker
skill-upgrades.description: Cracks armor against frozen enemies. (-10 armor, 3s)

skill-upgrades.name: Stick it to 'Em
skill-upgrades.description: Direct hits stick to enemies, deal +100 damage upon impact, and explode twice as fast.

skill-upgrades.name: Size Matters
skill-upgrades.description: If fully charged, affects a bigger radius.

skill-upgrades.name: Shattered
skill-upgrades.description: Direct hits explode immediately on impact and give 3x the Focus.

skill-upgrades.name: Ice Ball
skill-upgrades.description: Direct hits freeze enemies for longer on explosion. (4s)

skill-upgrades.name: Let's Chill Together
skill-upgrades.description: If fully charged, damage is increased for each enemy hit. (+60 per enemy, max +120)

skill-upgrades.name: Group Benefits
skill-upgrades.description: If fully charged, cooldown is reduce by 1s for each enemy hit.

skill-upgrades.name: Tactical Awareness
skill-upgrades.description: +10 back damage reduction. +10% damage from behind.

skill-upgrades.name: Frozen Focus
skill-upgrades.description: Gain additional Focus whenever you freeze an enemy. (Once every 5s)

skill-upgrades.name: Pure Escapism
skill-upgrades.description: Lose debuffs when you dodge. (Once every 20s)

skill-upgrades.name: Bloody Minded
skill-upgrades.description: Immunity to weakness. Recover from daze twice as fast.

skill-upgrades.name: Hardy
skill-upgrades.description:
25% degen resistance
[F]: 50% degen resistance after using FOCUS. (Lasts until you die)

skill-upgrades.name: Feeling Better
skill-upgrades.description: While using FOCUS, gain health over time. (150 HP/s)

skill-upgrades.name: Safety First
skill-upgrades.description: While sliding, gain health over time. (60 HP/s)

skill-upgrades.name: Snow Bowling
skill-upgrades.description:
Roll forward in a snowball. [Q] AGAIN: explode, deal area damage and freeze foes. (2s)
Reduced speed. No longer pushes.

skill-upgrades.name: Stay Healthy
skill-upgrades.description: Hitting an enemy increases and extends the health gain. (100 HP/s, 2s)

skill-upgrades.name: Uninhibited
skill-upgrades.description: Gain +25 armor and become immune to slow, cripple, and immobilize while sliding.

skill-upgrades.name: Forcefull Impact
skill-upgrades.description: [Q],[Q]: Dazes enemies on hit.

skill-upgrades.name: Play Nice
skill-upgrades.description: [Q],[Q]: Weakens enemies on hit. (-25% damage, 3s)

skill-upgrades.name: Extended Path
skill-upgrades.description: Path extends further.

skill-upgrades.name: Frostbite
skill-upgrades.description: Freeze strength is intensified over time.

skill-upgrades.name: A Slippery Slope
skill-upgrades.description: Allies move faster when on the path.

skill-upgrades.name: Path of Destruction
skill-upgrades.description: Allies gain +15% basic attack damage when on the path.

skill-upgrades.name: Flash Freeze
skill-upgrades.description: Frostbite happens faster.

skill-upgrades.name: Redistribution of Health
skill-upgrades.description: If an enemy is on your path, you are healed for 75 HP/s.

passives.name: Fastball
passives.description:
[RMB]: SNOWBALL TOSS travels faster and further.
DURING CLASH: With full health, cooldown is reduced by 8s.

passives.name: Let It Slide
passives.description:
[Q]: can slide longer before attacking.
DURING CLASH: Gain Focus when sliding.

passives.name: Lingering Effects
passives.description:
[E]: Speed boost and freeze last an extra 1s.
DURING CLASH: Extra duration increased to 2s.
